title: Looking For A Team!
body:
Hi, everyone. I'm looking for people wich play lots of league of legends and wich can do a team! 
I am:
In Game Name: Candy Chibi
Division: Bronze 4, 0 LP
Main Role: Support
Main Champs: {{champion:37}} And {{champion:267}} 
Role That You Can Play: ADC
Champs That You Can Play:{{champion:222}} And {{champion:133}} 
If you want to join, you need to write your:
Division:
Main Role:
Main Champs:
Role That You Can Play:
Champs That You Can Play:

You need not be gold or something cause you can't play with Bronzes I think x)
Ask to be friend with Candy Chibi when you did the thing, and don't forget to message me :)

-Candy Chibi   

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: I did use to play ADC alot to get me into B2, but after I mained support and other lanes I dropped alot. Now I cant re-find the success i used to have on ADC anymore.
That's probably the reason why your still in bronze. Pick 2 lanes and 3-4 champs in each and stick with that

Division: S4
Main Role: Fill 
Main Champs: Ap
Role That You Can Play: any
Champs That You Can Play: too many to say but pref ap.

Division: Bronze 
Main Role: ADC or MID
Main Champs: {{champion:236}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:202}}  for ADC, {{champion:127}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:117}}  for MID
Role That You Can Play: anything except support
Champs That You Can Play: anyone but the supports

im unranked
adc, jg
jinx, trynd, ashe, teemo, zed
adc, support, top, mid, jg yeah anything pretty decently
all stated above
not looking to team, just wanted to say that
